name: Dusky Lodge & Backpackers
description:
Welcome to Dusky Lodge & Backpackers, Kaikōura’s largest hostel and the ultimate spot for travellers looking to explore or just kick back! We’re conveniently located at 67 Beach Road, just a 10-minute walk from town and local attractions, and a quick 10-minute drive to some of the best surf in the country.

Our pool complex is ready to help you unwind, with a spa and sauna open daily all year round, and an outdoor pool perfect for cooling off on hot summer days.In summer, our poolside café serves up delicious wood-fired pizzas—ideal for enjoying under the sun with good company. Whether you’re chasing adventure or some chill time, our hostel has you covered. Enjoy the views from our decks, soak in the spa, and treat yourself at the café.

We’ve got room options for everyone, from dorms to private rooms. Our reception hours are 9 AM to 5 PM during winter and extend to 9 AM to 6 PM for summer. Arriving late? No worries—just let us know in advance and we’ll arrange a late check-in for you.

Join us at Dusky Lodge, where good vibes and unforgettable experiences await!

groupInformation.cancellationTerms: No refunds will be given if cancelled within 7 days of arrival.

houseRules.notes:
Dusky Lodge strictly prohibits bookings from individuals under the age of 18 unless accompanied by a parent or legal guardian. The following guidelines apply:

Accompanied Under 18’s

Guests under the age of 18 must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian to stay in a private room.
The hostel does not provide cots, or baby cribs.

Unaccompanied Under 18’s in Groups:

Unaccompanied guests under the age of 18 are not allowed to stay in shared rooms unless the entire room is booked by their group.

Please let us know in a separate e-mail to info@duskylodgebackpackers.co.nz  if arriving after 7pm we will explain where you key is to your room and how to find your room after hours.
